system.description:
Whenever time passes, roll + Savior to see how the members of your legacy feel or react to your most recent exploits.

Before rolling, ask the other players to answer these questions about your performance. Take -1 to the roll for each “no” answer:

  • have you been upholding the traditions of your legacy?
  • have you maintained the image of your legacy?
  • have you made the other members of your legacy proud?

failure.label: Complications...
failure.value: Something you did stirred up the hornet’s nest—expect several members of your legacy to meddle with your life.

partial.label: Partial success
partial.value:
One of them offers you meaningful encouragement, an opportunity, or an advantage.

Another is upset with your most recent actions, and will make their displeasure known.

success.label: Success!
success.value: One of them offers you meaningful encouragement, an opportunity, or an advantage.
